description:
This little VST has a wondeful sound and is useful when you want a bit of virtual analogue goodness in your piece.

It's stable and its UI is easy to use. Highly recommended for simply, but high quality basic subtractive sounds.
summary: Good sound, nice interface, and stable

description:
It's a sweet virtual analog synthesizer, and like a real one - it's VERY fun to screw around with. This may be a new favorite!
If you want to do synth-noodling while flying without taking a metal box with different colored wires on the plane, then this program is for you!
mehr braucht man nicht um Musik zu verfremden. Bester Synthesizer.
